titleStmt.title: A new years-gift, or A token of love to all persons of what perswasion soever. By a Friend, and lover of all men.
titleStmt.author: Friend and lover of all men.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Whitledge over against the Hatt and Feather, on Addle-hill, near Doctors-Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: Thomas Whitledge over against the Hatt
